Who is Bridgecrest? What is their function?
What does Basis do?
Where does my data go? Who can see it?
How does the platform work?
What happens if I do not wear my watch?
What happens if I’m red? Why?
Bridgecrest medical is a team of safety specialists that uses the latest technology to help individuals and corporations manage individual risk and fatigue. The Bridgecrest med team uses data analytics and IoT to provide the most innovative fatigue management solutions. Bridgecrest is a one-stop solution that allows for seamless interaction between workers and corporations about their well-being.
The Basis Peak is the smartwatch responsible for driving the data collection for the Bridgecrest algorithms that eventually indicate the fatigue status of the employee. The watch uses the following sensors to collect data: [Optical Heart Rate - Galvanic Skin Response - Skin Temperature - 3-axis Accelerometer] When it comes to battery life, the Basis Peak has about, an average of 4 days, and is water resistant up to 5ATM (enough to withstand swimming).
We take a lot of care with your data. Your data is transferred to a secure server in California, USA operated by Bridgecrest Medical on the Amazon Cloud Platform. The servers have state of the art surveillance and access control to ensure that no one sees your data who is not authorized to see it. We use advanced firewalls and encryption to protect you!
Your employer tells us who should be able to see the data. Most likely, this is the doctor on your job site. This data allows them to make just-in-time management decisions to ensure your safety!
Employee watch data synchronizes with the employee’s phone every two hours. We synchronize (pull) this data into our servers one hour before the shift starts and use our scalable computing power to instantly run the risk analysis.
Our synchronization process works at two levels. Bluetooth from the watch to the phone and wirelessly from the phone to the servers.
If you don’t wear your watch it will cause your status to become red “Do Not Drive” So it’s important to wear your watch especially when sleeping.
If the Bridgecrest application displays your status to be Red, it is indicating that you are not fit enough to drive and are too fatigued.
You should hear from your manager for further instruction.
NOTIFICATIONS Get Started We do all the heavy lifting so you do not have to. Easly know your status to drive Contact Managers with one-click View data and set goals Log In Email Password Retrieve Password Forgot Password Security and Privacy We take your privacy seriously. Rest assured!
